    • range

      @NotNull public @NotNull RayTraceContext.Builder range(double range)
      Override the raytrace range.

      Note: range is clamped at [1, 100].

      Parameters:
      range - the new range
      Returns:
      the modified builder

    • raySize

      @NotNull public @NotNull RayTraceContext.Builder raySize(double raySize)
      Override the raytrace ray size. Ray size effectively grows the ray's collider when checked against entities. Default value is 0.
      Parameters:
      raySize - the new non-negative ray size
      Returns:
      the modified builder

    • fluidMode

      @NotNull public @NotNull RayTraceContext.Builder fluidMode(@NotNull @NotNull FluidCollisionMode fluidMode)
      Override the fluid collision mode for the raytrace. Default value is FluidCollisionMode.NEVER.
      Parameters:
      fluidMode - the new mode
      Returns:
      the modified builder

    • ignorePassable

      @NotNull public @NotNull RayTraceContext.Builder ignorePassable(boolean ignorePassable)
      Override whether the raytrace should ignore passable blocks (blocks that the player can move through). Default value is true.
      Parameters:
      ignorePassable - the new value
      Returns:
      the modified builder

    • blockFilter

      @NotNull public @NotNull RayTraceContext.Builder blockFilter(@NotNull @NotNull Predicate<Block> blockPredicate)
      Define a predicate of entities to filter when casting the raytrace. All other entities will be ignored. Default value isn't colliding with all blocks.
      Parameters:
      blockPredicate - the new predicate
      Returns:
      the modified builder

    • filter

      @NotNull public @NotNull RayTraceContext.Builder filter(@NotNull @NotNull Predicate<Entity> entityPredicate)
      Define a predicate of entities to filter when casting the raytrace. All other entities will be ignored. Default value is colliding with all entities.
      Parameters:
      entityPredicate - the new predicate
      Returns:
      the modified builder

    • build

      @Nullable public @Nullable RayTraceContext build()
      Build a raytrace context from this builder.
      Returns:
      the built context

    • blocks

      @Nullable public @Nullable RayTraceResult blocks(@NotNull @NotNull World world)
      Build and cast the raytrace checking only blocks.
      Parameters:
      world - the world to cast the raytrace in
      Returns:
      the result

    • entities

      @Nullable public @Nullable RayTraceResult entities(@NotNull @NotNull World world)
      Build and cast the raytrace checking both blocks and entities.
      Parameters:
      world - the world to cast the raytrace in
      Returns:
      the result
